title: Hextech keys
body:
Hello everyone!

I have a question about key fragments. Im getting every week my chests but maybe Im not playing enough game to earn 3 key fragments a week so I can open the chest. Now I have 9 chests but I cant open none of them. I read that only 12 key fragments drop a month, or I can get 4 keys a month but I already have 9 chests. Does that mean that I will never open all my chests by earning key fragments?

replies.body:
The droprate for key fragments looks like a curve moreso than a line. This means with each fragment that drops, your chances of earning the next one goes down. The system was designed this way to make earning fragments for players who play less often as equal as players who go hard in the paint and play hours each day. 

For a complete rundown on this system, check out our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) Let me know if you have any questions.
Is it true that I can get only 4 keys a month by collecting key fragments?
There's no cap on how many fragments you can earn each month, it just continues to get exponentially harder to get key fragments with each one that drops.
